sentence.Network_en: Hooker didn't squander his money on flashy cars or other vices.
sentence.Network_cn: 胡克没有将自己的钱浪费在豪华轿车或其他恶习上。

sentence.Network_en: Don't squander your time in reading those dime novels.
sentence.Network_cn: 不要把你的时间浪费在读那些胡编乱造的廉价小说上.

sentence.Network_en: Naturally , hardly anyone could afford to squander so much time every day.
sentence.Network_cn: 几乎没有一个人能天天如此虚度光阴.

entry.tran: 浪费，挥霍(金钱、资源、机遇等)
entry.def: If you squander money, resources, or opportunities, you waste them.

example.ex: Hooker didn't squander his money on flashy cars or other vices...
example.tran: 胡克没有将自己的钱浪费在豪华轿车或其他恶习上。

example.ex: He had squandered his chances to win.
example.tran: 他白白浪费了获胜的机会。

sentences.sentence: "He wasted his inheritance on his insincere friends"
"You squandered the opportunity to get and advanced degree"

auth_sentence.content: Loyalty is hard to buy but easy to squander.

auth_sentence.content: They squander them with programs designed to make you poorer.

means.word_mean: (指钱, 财产等)浪费, 乱花

sentences.en: He squanders all the money which his father gives him.
sentences.cn: 他挥霍了他父亲给他的全部钱财。

sentences.en: A person my age shouldn't squander their eyes
sentences.cn: 一个像我这么大年纪的人不应该不知爱惜地用眼。
